bibl.title: Charting the Atlantic with Hesiod and Hellanicus.
bibl.note: I. Text and translation of P. Oxy. VIII, 1084 (= Pack2 459) [hereafter P]. - II. The author of P. "I accept that P is from an ancient copy of Hellanicus' Atlantis." - III. Unexpected diction in P. - IV. Hellanicus' source. - V. Hesiod fr. 170. - VI. Hellanicus fr. 19b and Hesiod fr. 170.
bibl.seg: THOMAS Oliver R.H., Charting the Atlantic with Hesiod and Hellanicus.
